resources.string: Select an amount and an organization you care about, and hop on your bicycle, throw on your running shoes go for a walk, or participate in an event of your choosing. Raise money by the Mile or by the Hour, with the help of others too.
Simply select an amount, and choose an organization that interests you.
Head outside for a relaxing walk.
Throw on your running shows and go for a hard run
Hop on your bicycle for a long ride in the great outdoors
Try anything else that could help you raise money, and donate by the hour instead.
Hop on your bike, or head out for a run or walk and raise money by the mile, or attend an event and raise money by the hour.
